code: import{createSelector}from"reselect";var totalScore=function totalScore(state){return state.progress.totalScore;};var isLevelCompleted=function isLevelCompleted(state){return state.progress.isLevelCompleted;};var scoreOnTheLevel=function scoreOnTheLevel(state){return state.progress.scoreOnTheLevel;};var level=function level(state){return state.progress.level;};var maxLevel=function maxLevel(state){return state.progress.maxLevel;};export var selectTotalScore=createSelector([totalScore],function(totalScore){return totalScore;});export var selectLevel=createSelector([level],function(level){return level;});export var selectIsLevelCompleted=createSelector([isLevelCompleted],function(isLevelCompleted){return isLevelCompleted;});export var selectScoreOnTheLevel=createSelector([scoreOnTheLevel],function(scoreOnTheLevel){return scoreOnTheLevel;});export var selectMaxLevel=createSelector([maxLevel],function(maxLevel){return maxLevel;});
